extendedInfo.description: Onkyoâs Remote App supports wireless audio and remote control functionality.Onkyoâs Remote App allows owners to integrate wireless audio stored on an Android device into their Onkyo home network system. The app operates over a wireless LAN and enables a range of remote control functions, such as volume and tone control and input selection.Functions:Â â¢ Wirelessly streams music stored on an Android deviceâ¢ Operates general remote-control functions (e.g. play, stop, power on/off)Â â¢ Controls multi-zone audioâ¢ Selects input source, network source, and radio stationÂ â¢ Adjusts tone control, listening modes, and speaker volumeâ¢ Displays content informationÂ â¢ Compatible with Spotify (Depends on areas)â¢ Compatible with Onkyoâs existing RI (Remote Interactive) system  *For details on RI-compatible systems, please refer to the Onkyo website. *This application program does not support tablet devices. *This application program does not support smartphones in QVGA or HVGA resolution.Compatible Onkyo Models:â¢ All network A/V receivers released in 2010/11/12/13, TX-8050 Network Stereo Receiver, T-4070 Network Stereo Tuner, and CR-N755*Â *All models may require a firmware update available for download at the Onkyo website.

reviews.title: Nearly perrrrrrfect
reviews.comment: Love it BUT volume bar TOO jumpy could easy be more sensitive and also could be a \'What u hear\' on this app so u can amp up youtube, bbc iplayer radio, audio streaming on your phone. If u do this I promise I will buy another Onkyo coz besides this they are audio heaven in a black box. Oh Yeh Baby!! :)......just realised u can use phone volume control buttons so now thats perfectly accurate now! :)  so maybe just \'what u hear\' ? SO NEEDS A WHAT U HEAR BUTTON FOR STREAMING ECT.then 10 STARS!!!!!!
reviews.author: Micheal Bishop

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: It is a bit quirky sometimes but all in all. I LOVE IT. Have zone 2 going to speakers in my bedroom and I love being able to pull up Pandora and put something on to get my wife in the mood. ;-) Anything that helps in that department gets 5 stars in my book.
reviews.author: Steven Pierce

reviews.title: Net Zone 2
reviews.comment: Once I select an artist to start playing in a folder via DLNA I am unable to navigate back to the folder list to change to any other artist or song for that matter. Please fix this as I cannot use this app in it\'s current condition. The Integra Remote app works for this but the volume doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Aaron Desjardins

reviews.title: Currently playing?
reviews.comment: The app is fair enough but I don\'t know how to switch to the current play list or what ever is played at the moment...? Maybe I\'m dumb but it is not intuitive...
reviews.author: Yan Graf

reviews.title: Does not connect to receiver.
reviews.comment: App does not connect to receiver. No manual connection option. Does not work. I use OnkyTroller instead. It\'s not a good looking substitute, but it has a manual connect option.
reviews.author: Jay Kurrle

reviews.title: Good app. Needs more work.
reviews.comment: I use it to play music from my Spotify account but it doesn\'t support shuffle or repeat, which is kind of a pain.
reviews.author: Joe Martinez

reviews.title: Fix Zone-2 control
reviews.comment: I have a new TX-NR626 receiver and I can\'t change volume in Zone-2 with my Android tablet.  Apple devices are able to.  I\'ve tried several Android devices and none of them work.   All other functions work fine.
reviews.author: Ed Miller

reviews.title: Use this more than my physical remote!
reviews.comment: This app is great, I use it majority of the time because I\'m normally not where I can use the reg remote. I\'d rate it 5 stars if Onkyo would allow the 2nd zone to navigate thru the net sources. You have to turn on the 1st zone to find the right channel.
reviews.author: Alex Humphrey

reviews.title: Not ready for prime time
reviews.comment: Can\'t up or down vote on Pandora.  Dlna navigation is excruciating.  God help you if you select the wrong input device. There is no way to select a different one once the choice is made short of uninstalling
reviews.author: Robby White

reviews.title: Will not connect..
reviews.comment: Why this won\'t connect to my receiver is beyond me.. And why in the world they don\'t have an option for setting the receiver IP address manually is even worse.. In the past when it has worked it is good but no matter of network tinkering I do with my router and the receiver works.. PLEASE ADD A MANUAL SETTING OPTION.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy dlna support
reviews.comment: The dlna function between qnap/twonky dlna server and tx-nr414 reciever does not connect. I need to connect to the dlna server with the normal remote controll, after that I can proceed using the app. Besides this bug I don\'t like the design and layout tough this has nothing todo with the functionality.
reviews.author: Wim Rademaker

reviews.title: Fix it please.
reviews.comment: Frequently is unable to find my receiver. When it does find the receiver it works very well. Needs to be fixed. Ability to manually search via ip address would be ideal.
reviews.author: Joshua Sabedra

reviews.title: Wont work anymore
reviews.comment: It worked fine till now. Cant find the receiver..just the dvd player..I have an S4 but the app still works on the iphone
reviews.author: Neil Norwood

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I use this every day and it\'s pretty awesome. However there\'s still room for improvement, but I\'m just grateful that it is working is well. Good job Onkyo! :)
reviews.author: Kim Fenger

reviews.title: Where\'s Google Music as an option for \"Net\" output?
reviews.comment: Good app, but when will it be possible to utilize google music to play music through the onkyo system?
reviews.author: Ike Akinwande

reviews.title: Onkyo designer
reviews.comment: This App is excellent it can even turn on my amp (shame on you samsung tv app).  Please update the design it only needs a polish up and smoother experience.  Than it will be a big high five from this happy customer!
reviews.author: Joel Moocarme

reviews.title: cannot connect to amp from samsung s3
reviews.comment: been trying for two weeks now (that\'s how long I\'ve had the app and receiver) and it has yet to find the amp or connect.  And since I can\'t even enter the ip address, the app is useless.  I tried setting amp to both wired and wireless and using dhcp and giving it a fixed ip - nothing works. Looks like they\'ve known about this issue for a long time and have chosen to not fix it.
reviews.author: Brian Santell

reviews.title: STILL NEEDS TO BE FIXED!...
reviews.comment: MANY complaints about the shifted to right screen...appears to be affecting fewer phones, but still have the same issue on Droid 4\'s . Limits functional aspects of remote operations. Supposed to be investigated by engineering according to forum.
reviews.author: Roger Clance

reviews.title: Near perfect
reviews.comment: Works perfectly.. zone control is great and volume adjustment is fine if using physical phone buttons not on screen. Maybe shuffle would enhance but happy as larry. New txnr626.
reviews.author: Kurt abbot

reviews.title: Works, but could be better
reviews.comment: Please add shuffle to the spotify app functionality. Thanks.
reviews.author: Adalon Chen
